document_data.name: Goosefoot
document_data.mainbody: '''Goosefoot''' was a type of leafy plant that grew in [[Maztica]] and was among the main food sources for the [[Azuposi]] [[human]]s who dwelled there.
document_data.Availability: Goosefoot was known to grow in the [[Pasocada Basin]] of Maztica. These were cultivated by the Azuposi, along with [[beeweed]], [[calabash]]es, [[juniper]], [[mayz]],  [[melon]]s, [[pigweed]], [[pinyon pine]], [[prickly pear]], [[squash]], and various beans.
document_data.Uses: Besides being edible, goosefoot could be used to make a sedative. Particularly one that treated hysteria or nervous tension.<ref>
